title: Rassegnina del 30 nov 2023
text:
Leggere

Fernando del Pino Calvo-Sotelo - blog post che rilegge criticamente la Laudate Deum o nuovo dogma climatico

Ascoltare

â€œUnHerdâ€ Podcast Episode on ğŸ™Busting the Bill Gates myth â€œThrough the Gates Foundation Bill Gates is not donating money as much as he is buying policy influenceâ€. Investigative journalist Tim Schwab challenges the mith of the good philanthropist billionaire: do their foundations sustain good public goals set by (elected) public officials or unduly influence the destination of taxpayer money by way of their outsized leverage on international and supranational organizations (e.g.Â Gavi Alliance - WHO - big pharma)?



Ricordare

Marcello Foa - â€œIl sistema Invisibileâ€


(V. Volkoff in â€œLe montageâ€ 1982) Quando si parla di mobilitare le masse, in realtÃ  non si ha che uno scopo: immobilizzarle.
